content: Hi all, I just want to introduce myself. My name is Lars Br端njes, I am a German mathematician turned software engineer and educator, have been playing with Coq every now and again for the last 20 years and recently discovered Lean and want to give it a try.
Hi @Lars Br端njes ! Welcome! Just thought I would mention that I really like your work on nonstandard etale cohomology.
Thanks a lot, @Adam Topaz ! That's very kind of you to say! I thought nobody gave a damn... :grinning:
We're slowly but surely making our way to standard etale cohomology in lean
